channel.title: Adding an action to an object upon clicking
channel.description: Im trying to add an altar and make it so when you click the altar it will change your spell book to lunars. my source seems to not have an object for 17010 id which is typically for the lunar altar.

item.title: Adding an action to an object upon clicking
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

That would be an alternative and would work the same, yes.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an action to an object upon clicking

item.title: Adding an action to an object upon clicking
item.dc:creator: @Divnityrs Divnityrs
item.description:
@Divnityrs wrote:

Well what I was going to do was just use a different altar that does not have a function.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an action to an object upon clicking

item.title: Adding an action to an object upon clicking
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

If your client doesn’t support objects up to 17010, that’s not a server problem. You need to load higher data, or find the model for the lunar altar and add it manually.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an action to an object upon clicking
